channel.title: The OFC Fight Feed
channel.description: The RSS feed of Otaniemi Fight Club.

item.title: UFC and Tortillas at Kattosauna!
item.description: OFC organized an open event at Kattosauna: The latest matches in UFC, tortillas, and sauna -- What could be better?

item.title: First XQ to Honbu's Friday karate!
item.description: OFC did their first XQ to Honbus Friday karate session. OFC's 8 participants were instructed by Honbu's Juri Maki. Great success!

item.title: New web site launched!
item.description: OFC's new AYY based web site got launched. Please share your comments at the Facebook group!
